author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower niche metal profile tips…I’m framing this niche using @schlutersystemsna JOLLY which is embedded in thin-set mortar. I set the bottom profile and sill tiles, ensuring the grout joints align with the main wall tiles. Then I add the sides, top profile, and inspect the four miter joints - everything should be in the same plane and even with the tile assembly 🔥#tileshower #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Niche Metal Profile Tips - #shorts #tileshower #homerepairtutor
